Key Match Events: The Diamondbacks fell one win short of a four-game sweep of the Brewers after leading 8-0 in the third inning but losing 10-9, marking their first loss in such a scenario in franchise history.
Post-Match Reflections: The Diamondbacks dropped to the third and final wild card spot in the National League with six games remaining, questioning their bullpen's ability to perform in the postseason despite a strong offense.
